text: Shirley Anne Burgess (born about 1934), was a female athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== She represented England and won a bronze medal in the 4 x 110 Yard Relay at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, Canada and also competed in the 100 and 220 yards. She also represented Woolwich Polytechnic. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:English female sprinters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in athletics Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Living people
title: Shirley Burgess
